result.title: Protocol for Climate Smart Farming demonstration activities and campaigns
result.description: Building on the FarmDemo Training Kit, this protocol will specifically focus on the design, delivery and evaluation of climate smart farming demonstration events, including the provision of an inventory of recognized farm demo activities. This guide will outline: potential demonstration approaches (including for on-farm, virtual and hybrid events), the multi-actor approach to farm demos, the use of GHG toolkits, and the demonstration of carbon farming opportunities.
